about_the_game:
Beeze has stubled into the circus while eating cheese, The clown there isn't to happy about the awful smell of the cheese he is eating, and want Beeze to eat real cheese.

This is a horror fps game that puts you in the shoes of a Beeze, who has stubled into Boo Boo's Circus. The clown has gone mad and you have to move around the low budget circus to collect reeze's cheese back, and give them to your step brother Reeze to get the key to open the gate.

The DLC will maybe get some more content.

This is a joke game made by me, Vander in one day! I used suggestions from my Discord server and made this horrible game :D

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes typical horror elements, but there is no blood, bodly harm or nudity.
